content.detailedDescription:
I live in so. california, every night after 9pm if you look up towards alterus (the brightest star) you will see stars that are farther away than most of them just gliding across the sky. i've to come make it a habit each night for the past 6-9 months to go outside, prop my head up and watch this amazing thing happen.

i've learned that they just fly back and forth from over where area 51 would be (miles away from san diego)northwest i think to past where mexico would be (southeast i think)...They are not shooting stars, they are not satellites and they are deifinitely not airplanes or any manmade vehicle.

i once heard that ufos will sit out there for hours and pretend to be stars, i believe this now. i've made it into a family thing....My husband and children thought i was crazy and did not believe me until they sat out there and watched for themselves.

these crafts are like monitoring our skies (especially here in so.Cal), where my house is located, i believe it is like their runway where they take off and return.  it's absolutely amazing to see! you can follow them from the time you see them until they like disappear.

up until last night, we watched with the naked eye. last night, we got out binoculars and the craft that seemed to be moving slowly across the sky are actually going at a speed that nothing manmade could ever do and they are much higher than we thought.

they look exactly like stars! except they are the ones are the tiniest in the sky!

attached is amateur video of one that we took one night in august of this year.

check it out for yourself and if you ever show up at my house when it gets dark, i will show you something that will be amazing to even you.  unless you are already aware of this.  i'm sure nasa and the government are already.  there is no way that i am the only seeing this.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Witnessed what seemed like stars moving back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
While i was driving to work about 9:40pm on 10/13/2009, i noticed a flashing blueish light in the sky. i had just passed through the doylestown area merging from sr 585n to sr 21n. the light seemed like it could be a spotlight from the ground moving in a counter clockwise circular pattern. 

after watching while i drove, it became apparent that the light was not being projected from the ground. the light seemed to come from within the cloud. the light was not reflected as it would be if the source were external. i could not see any source however. i don't know exactly how far from the ground this was but it was relatively close, maybe a few hundred feet above.

the circumference was pretty large in my opinion. i hadn't seen or heard about the moscow halo cloud until i got to work but it seemed to be about that size and distance from the ground. what i saw looked pretty much the same but the lights were moving around continuously in a counter clockwise motion. there was no steady light in the center, just around the edges. i could see the light circle all the way around at a slight angle which would lead me to believe that what ever was projecting this was either smaller and in the center of the cloud or not visible. this may lend more credence to a spotlight except for the fact that i drove at least ten miles while the light kept perfectly in front of me. i eventually lost sight of the anomaly when sr 21 merged into i-77n near fairlawn (sr 18). due to the size and relatively close proximity to the ground i would think that a spot light would have been passed up long before then. also the way the light moved inside the cloud gave a definite 3-d appearance.

when i arrived at work i told my friend but he dismissed it as a helicopter. i have never witnessed helicopters act like this and the light was much larger than a typical search light, not to mention the spinning motion would not lend itself well to searching. the light rotated around the equator, if this had been spherical. it was more like around a doughnut at a slight enough angle that i could see the light come around the back top left corner. in the doughnut analogy you would not see the center hole from my vantage point.

i later went to yahoo to look at the headlines were the first thing i see is the moscow halo cloud. i told my other co-worker that that was exactly what i saw. we played the you tube video but this one didn't have the rotating light. 

i am pretty picky in what i term a ufo. a group of friends and i saw a full blown ship while in high school about 14 years back (shreve, ohio summer of 95~). we were in a cornfield and saw what looked like a spot light from a helicopter but with no sound, coming from over a barn. the next thing i knew the craft was directly above us. it must have only been a few hundred feet from the ground. made no noise. all we could do is stare up at it. the ship took up the entire sky. it looked to be flat gray in color but glowing an indigo blueish color. the ship was circular and in the middle had a large ring that was emitting a white light. there were smaller lights positioned around the large light in the middle. i noticed no markings on the craft. we were frozen. then, in an instant, it was gone. for several years afterward i could not talk about the experience without getting chills and my eyes watering.

i know i'm mixing accounts but i consider pretty much anything less than that logically explainable. what makes me tell you about this most recent one is the similarity of it to the moscow halo cloud. it is being dismissed as meteorological but this is so close to the same thing to be coincidence. if these are the same thing, i don't want the story to die due to lack of accounts and the typical "weather phenomenon" explanation. 

another coincidence that happened a few nights back, sunday morning the 11th of october 2009 around 3-4am, wooster, oh, i was listening to coast to coast am outside looking at the stars. i saw a bright blue flash come from the front side of my house (i was in the back yard) that lit up the whole sky. immediately after, the power in my house went out and then came right back. there were no clouds and did not seem to be lightning. it was around 38 degrees f that night. i didn't see anything other than that but these latest things seem to be coincidental. 

i am sorry if i wrote a book but i have wanted to relay my experiences to mufon for some time now and there is something about this latest sighting that made me want to tell you.

thanks.
content.summary: Similar to moscow halo cloud

content.detailedDescription:
While watching ''faux " venus  early on the morning, this strange amber "orb"  cross the path of my house and suddently disapear. this nothing like plane or satellite. the light is to much bright and didnt make anyflashing light like a plane.

the nearest major aiport is cfb bagotville, norad interceptor base. at 350km north eastern. i saw many cf-18 in my life and its nothing like this.


the object motion is coming from west, to north, north east. the object move at a steady trajectory till the end of the video when i catch after moving toward house, the light make a quick 50 degre turn and speed up and just disapear.

ps : sorry for my bad english its not my main language.



http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=dmk8jjf0fds&feature=player_profilepage
content.summary: While watching ''faux " venus  early on the morning, this strange amber "orb"  cross the path of my house and suddently disapear.

content.detailedDescription:
This object was observed on september 25, 2009 at approximately 5:30 pm - while riding the bus back to new york city after attending the nasa astronauts sts-127 tweetup in dc the day before, i happened to see what at first i thought was a contrail in the sky. but after a closer look, i realized that the 'contrail' was moving steadily across the sky from west to east, not elongating, but following this object. it was like the tail of a comet, but only it was white, like the smoke a space shuttle leaves behind while hurtling through space. this 'tail or trail' followed behind the object never gaining length, but remaining the same size as it proceeded across the sky. whatever the object was, it was moving at a fairly fast clip, dragging this 'tail' behind it, but i was unable to see the object. it did not appear to be a plane, if it was, it was so high up as to be invisible at this distance. i tried to photograph it and this is the result. as you can see, the 'tail' is a certain length. it never got longer as a contrail would. instead, it just continued to move behind this object as it crossed the sky. 

the woman sitting across from me looked up curiously as she saw me take a photo, but neither of us commented on it. i am hoping someone can tell me if a satellite or military plane was making a normal flight that day at that time. the 'tail' was not as thick as it appears in the photo. i don't know why it photographed this way, it was definitely a 'tail' not at all a thick cloud. the first photo is a blurr and not very good. the second one shows the tail as it moved across the sky. i was puzzled as it reminded me of nothing but a space shuttle or satellite and i believe a satellite does not carry a tail and there was no shuttle scheduled to fly that course that i was aware. 

we were on the road, not yet at the jersey turnpike and there was a treeline to our right as we zipped past towns. i could not see any houses at this time, only trees or wooded area on the ground. we had left dc at 2:30 pm and hit a lot of traffic before baltimore so we were running about an hour behind schedule. 
location: somewhere between delaware and new jersey
content.summary: Long tail on object flying west to east in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Came out of northern sky headed due south. crossed horizon in 5-6 seconds

walked outside on pool deck going to the backyard to walk the pup before bed and saw the disc out of corner of my right eye. it appeared and disappeared so quick that my initial reaction was, "that was a ufo"
it was changing colors from brilliant white to ice blue and back to white. there was no trail like a comet or shooting star. also there was no sound from the object. 
there was a commercial 757 heavy on approach to the south east setting up for a landing at mco. the speed of the disc was 6-7 times faster than the 757.
i grew up flying with my dad; we owned a small municipal airport in east tennessee.
i have been flying since i was 12 and a licensed pilot since i became legal at 16, multi rated,i have over 3500 hours single & twin engine left seat and with over 150 hours in right seat of a lear 7.
this was a ufo, not a star, comet or swamp gas.
there have to be other reported sightings of this disc all over central florida.
it was on an approximate path from daytona to sarasota.
content.summary: Came out of northern sky headed due south. crossed horizon in 5-6 seconds

content.detailedDescription: myself my daughter and my mother in law were comming back from a party that my daughter was attending. it was about 7:30 pm when we driving home on the 15 frwy north the we proceeded to take the 91 west and the on ramp was bumper to bumper and came to a complete stop. my daughter in a very excited voice said (dad look at this pointing to my left)we were facing north, about 100 ft in the northern sky was a large aproximately 60 ft across disc shaped craft just gliding effortlessly with no sound we had our windows open and heard nothing but the traffic from the frwy below. it was black with a reddish orange glow in the center and many white lights on the outer edge that moved around it,as it moved across from north to northeast and just dissapeard into the overcast sky. my daughter tried to tak a cell phone pic but it didnt come out. we we all amazed and didnt even realize what we had seen until we got home and talked about it later. i was not a believer, a fellow co-worker of mine had an experience and had video of it and he seen a bright light enery source of some kind that moved around the back of his house just off the santa ana river bed where the 60 frwy crosses over the river, this light moved to and fro then dropped some spinning type objects into the river bed. the video is chilling. i was a skeptic even after seeing my co-workers video,but i believe now and cant wait to see more.
content.summary: My family and i were driving in slow frwy traffic and seen a disc shaped object move slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 4:40 a.M., i got in my car and noticed a brillance of light in the eastern sky, as it tends to be very dark at this time of morning, as i live in rural east texas. approximately four minutes later, while driving east on hwy 175 toward frankston, tx, a silver disc shaped object came out of the trees and flashed across the sky quite close to the roof of my car and within seconds disappeared into the sky. it happened very quickly. there was no sound. it appeared to be "spinning" as it moved. i have a gut feeling that it was an alien craft; as i've felt there presence in the area. when i saw the craft, i was startled, yet not afraid. i was unable to see the craft as i was driving and it disappeared quickly.
content.summary: Ufo zoomed across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Date:  thursday, september 3, 1987
time:  between 7:30 and 8:00 p.M.

location:  outside a mobile home residence in bartlesville, ok

weather conditions:
temperature was estimated between 85 & 90f, no clouds, somewhat hazy.  the sun had set at ground level where i was located, but the sky was still bright and well illuminated.

sighting:
i was at this location to inquire about about an automobile for sale.  the owner was first to observe the object as it approached from a southeasterly direction.  he was facing that direction while we were talking.  he kept mentioning that there was something strange approaching which he thought might be a bird since it appeared dark in color.  i did not observe the object until it was directly overhead.

shape:  the object appeared to be perfectly circular as witnessed from its bottom surface.  its bottom side appeared to be very dark, almost black, however i concluded later that the bottom was in the shade as the sunlight struck the object from its west side.  

the object passed directly overhead and proceeded in a northwesterly direction.  as it continued on (at an estimated rate of speed similar to a light private airplane of 100-120 mph) we both noted that its top and bottom surfaces were flat.  during this period of time, i saw the sunshine reflect off its west side.  it appeared that the object was constructed of a metallic substance which had either been burned or perhaps it was its natural color as areas appeared charred or tarnished.  some weeks later a fellow worker showed me a sheet of titanium which looked much like the outer surface in color i witnessed on the saucer.

as the object continued to fly away from us we were able to see more detail on its upper deck area.  there appeared a vertical beam (or beams?) ontop of which rested a horizontal beam which was shorter than the diameter of the object itself.  the horizontal beam was oriented at a normal to the direction of flight such that at a far distance, it made the object appear similar to a biplane.  

size:  the object was much smaller than a full moon (at its zenith).  because the object appeared very sharp in an otherwise somewhat hazy sky, i deduced that it was quite low (in altitude).  i would guess it was flying about 500-700 ft. above ground level at the time we viewed it.   it flew steady, completely silent with no indication of navigation lights of any kind (though it was daylight of course).   

during the following weekend i attended a local "flyin" of private aircraft held across town at our airport.  i was able to observe various aircraft flying at varying altitudes which helped me estimate the over all size of the object we sighted that evening.  my best guess was that its diameter was about 18 ft.
the object appeared somewhat smaller than the wing span of a stearman biplane in my estimation (which is 20 ft.) but about the same as a pitts special (single seat) biplane.

construction:  the sun briefly illuminated the west side of the object revealing an outer surface composed of a metallic substance.  i had the impression that there no plates or rivets showing though they may have not been visible at that distance.  it appeared to be seamless, similar to stainless steel liquid nitrogen tanks in service today.  however the outer surface of this object did appear to have been oxidized (burned or scorched).

flight characteristics:  the object flew a very stable path, straight and level from a southeasterly direction to a northwesterly direction, directly over our heads.  this object appeared to be moving at a rate of speed similar to private aircraft such as cessna 172 for instance (100-130 mph).  we heard nor saw any wobbling, spinning, lights or noise of any kind.  one might expect that the beams we witnessed on the upper deck would have created some sound due to wind noise at the speed it was traveling.  but we heard nothing at all.

conclusions:  this saucer shaped object appeared to contain no aerodynamic surfaced deemed necessary for flight in our atmosphere.  also it appeared to have no external engine or propulsion system we could see, no down thrusting fan or engine mounted on the saucer shaped object.  there was no way to estimate its weight (or mass).  of course it could have been filled with a lighter than air gas such as helium or hydrogen for all i know.  

my qualification as a spotter:   my experience as a spotter/observer of aircraft began at the early age of seven (7) just before the outbreak of wwii for the us (1941).  i was raised in el paso, texas which served the military as the "southern flyway" during the wwii and the korean conflict.  consequently i had the opportunity to witness a steady progression of us technology during those periods from 1941through until i left el paso in 1958.  

i spent much of my youth outside when the weather allowed and the weather was most generally very good there.  since we had no tv or air-conditioning in those years, we found many things to do outdoors.  many of us became very good at identifying wwii aircraft, both air corps and navy (since el paso served as a cross country refueling base for the navy). also, i was there during the korean conflict, when the sky was again full of both navy & air force aircraft.  i never ever saw anything day or night that looked like the saucer shaped object i saw on that late afternoon in early september of 1987 before or since that time.
content.summary: A disc shaped object passed directly overhead near sunset, estimated at around 20' diameter.

content.detailedDescription: I leave for work at this time twice a week, and this is the first time i have ever noticed something like this in my life.  i thought it could be spotlights or something, especially as there was a slight over cast and it rained later in the morning, but like i stated earlier i haven't seen any spotlights here before.  i was really surprised as to what i was seeing and didn't get an exact number but the lights were not following a set pattern, and they were all whitish/yellowish in color and circular and looked larger than spotlights, but not huge.  there were about 7-9 i would say and it appeared as if they were circling around each other almost in a playful way two or three at a time grouped together.  like i said, it could have been spotlights for search lights, but i've never noticed them before, and it's now 10pm the same day and there is nothing out and it's a clear sky.  just wondering what i might have seen if you have any ideas?!
content.summary: 7-9 circular shapes moving around each other in early morning sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the banzai pipeline beach in haleiwa taking pictures of the surfers and the waves.

when i took a picture of the sun behind the palm tree, i did not notice the object. i only saw it once i loaded the picture in the computer. there was no noise of helicopter or plane as i took the picture.

you are specialist, maybe you can tell me what it is.

thank you in advance
content.summary: Strange metallic oval object with a triangular structure on top.

content.detailedDescription: Traveling on rt. 206 south around 5;50 sat. 10/10/09. we noticed a chemtrail as it got closer we noticed the bright pink color the "plane" was the only thing that was pink. not the smoke it was spraying, it was gray, not the sky, it was blue. the sun was not setting so nothing had a pink hue like when the sun sets. it was moving north almost paraellel to 206. it looked like a "plane" but had a tall fin on top with several points or fins out of the bottom an side. i always have my camera because this is not the 1st video capture you can visit youtube and search mikie8865 for ufo video's.
content.summary: Pink plane like shape w/ tall fin on top  spraying chemtrails

content.detailedDescription:
we live under the flight path for ohare airport - noted a pulsing coppery colored light southbound that appeared to be near the broken clouds. the color was unique and reminded me of a previous sighting of the same style that we did not report to mufon a few months previously, that was a southbound object flying over the airport.

  this object appeared in the northeast over the trees of the park preserve and went straight south at about the same height as jupiter, just past jupiter and then vanished.

  when i first saw it i ran inside and grabbed my celestron 10 x 80 binoculars, and got it into focus, what i saw was what appeared to be a large rectangular translucent object, (atleast it was a rectangle on the bottom, i could not see the top it was dark) whose bottom appeared to be illuminated by the beacon in the center of its bottom edge, as it was traveling left to right.

  the illumination from the light source on the bottom was flame like but the color was odd, i dont know what to compare it to. and the bottom may have been v shaped or curved as the light from the bottom tapered off, gradiently as you looked up the side of it.

  my arms were shaking with excitement so i ran to the porch wall to steady my arms but then it simply vanished. blinked out... gone.

 the entire sighting was approximately 90 seconds, in the beginning when when i first saw it i hear a loud jet blast coming from behind me in the direction of ohare however i never saw a plane, and the jet blasy sounded different from the normal air traffic we deal with every day. im sorry i can not add more details...

-------------
mufon questions: 1) went out back for a smoke, chairs face east, and ive always been into astronomy, i look up all the time. 2) first noticed it because of peculiar color and modulation of light and fact we are in ohare atc area. 4) when i ran for binoculars i hoped it would not turn out to be juts  a helicopter or airplane. 5) i admit being excited when i could see the object instead of just 'an odd light' 6) it vanished in a blink of eye.
content.summary: Bright copper color - amber/red/gold pulsing dot viewed breifly in 10 x 80 binoculars

content.detailedDescription: On this date 10/12/2009 this investigator received information from a reliable source that the military would be conducting fly overs in the texas city area. my reliable source who wish to remain anonymous stated at a breifing was held with the law enforcement agenies in the area along with the fly overs could cause hallucinations causing citizens to see strange lights in the sky and over the waters in the area. the description of the military aircraft was given as a gray c27j a light transport plane.
content.summary: C27j military cargo plane

content.detailedDescription:
Day after the event i checked my voice mail. got one from my sister.
she only described strange lights drifting in and out behind clouds. at this time i don't know if a craft is involved or if the lights were n an object.My land line is down at tis time. now, i am in a public library, about to close. will try to get my land line up so my `internet acess will be up. will be in contact with my sister and get more info later sorry, i'm a poor typist plus have a broken hand. will contact you a`gin within 2 weeks, hopefully, having surgery tomorrow. i will release authorization for third party later, if interested
                                                falcon006
content.summary: Sister called me , left a` voice mail a`bout strage lights behind clouds

content.detailedDescription:
On september 17, 2009 at approximately 1430 hours central time, i was working outside with another individual.  the second individual who i will refer to as "dan" was the first to see the object.  dan asked me if i was able to see the object, and at first, i could not.  dan spent a few seconds trying to describe the location of the object and then i was able to see it.  the object appeared to be stationary or moving very slowly.  the object was a silver sphere and appeared to be at approximately 20,000 feet. the object was in the eastern sky north of interstate 10 and east of la hwy 102.  a quick look at my suunto watch indicated that the object was on an azimuth of 117 degrees.  

after approximately two minutes of watching this object, dan saw a second object that was a few thousand feet lower than the first object and slightly south of the first object's position.  dan was able to point the second object out to me.  the second object was on a azimuth of 119 degrees.  the second object was also stationary or moving very slowly.  after a few minutes of observing the second object, dan saw a third object.  despite dan's efforts, i was never able to see the third object.  

the two objects that i saw seemed to disappear immediately.  no sound was heard from either object.  the sky was slightly cloudy, but clear enough to track the objects. i have served in the military and know for a fact that these objects were not helicopters or jets.  the speed at which the objects left the area would indicate something other than conventional aircraft technology.  i can't say that it was alien, but it was certainly not normal.

unfortunately, the event happened so quickly that i was able to get any photos or footage of the objects.  i attempted to photograph the objects with my blackberry, but the distance and altitude of the objects made that impossible.

i will meet with a mufon investigator, but said investigator will have to contact me by email.
content.summary: Two stationary spheres viewed.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 10 years old. as i would put it; advanced humanoid beings have been visiting me every so often. they called themselves 'zons'. i was told i had a special gift called; 'reshaping reality'. at that age i didn't understand what was going on. it felt like a dream until i started getting telepathic messages. these messages would tell me to look at certain areas of the sky. there they were positioning themselves as stars.
these stars had diffrent tumbling colors such as red,blue,yellow,and green. as i've grown older. the message i got clearer as time had past. they told me they would look after me until the time was right. i thought i was going crazy but hearing about certain abductions. they told me things and have shown me things about the past and the future. one, that they are from a distant sister planet in our solar system millions of years ahead in technology. some are called 'watchers'. those are the diamond craft that charge by the sun's energy. these craft were told to me to be interceptors. because of the fact we have entered the 'nuclear decision threshold'. as said, they started the same way we have. from primitive bicameral tendencies to see the 'light'. i could go on and on about my story. but, you'd probably think i'm lying to you. i see them all the time on clear nights. if you don't believe me. i'll show you. i have what you call one of the 'watchers' position themselves over my house every night. something big is about to happen. i feel i'm joining the civilization of the universe! contact me. i'm proof positive!

                                        come and see for yourself,
                                        gregg
content.summary: Every since my last encounter in my bedroom on 3/27/09. they've been showing up!

content.detailedDescription:
Disc shaped object passed over verde river bed going ne to w. it had amber colored lights on the bottom. a second sighting occurred on june 20, 1997 around 1:00 a.M. in the morning, passing in front and over one of the witness' house. the object sparkled like "diamond."
 
other witnesses: june 19 sighting: two neighbors (both retired military) observed the disc. they full moon revealed the object was made of some type of metal. object had darkened windows. smaller objects seen blinking alternating red and white lights. 

large red orb-like object went across mingus mountain and was also accompanied by the smaller objects with the red and white lights. the same red orb-like object went behind the mountain and reappeared. objects seemed to be "playing" with each other.
content.summary: Disc with amber colored lights observed by multiple witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work (security) on a building site alone.I had left my cabin for a cigarette and coming from the west of me travelling east i saw a orange/red light.It was moving slowly but in a straight line maybe 1000ft up.I took my cellphone out & videoed what i saw.In front of me about 70 meters away there is an embankment which has a main road on top so i could only see the objects until they went over the top.No sooner had the first gone out of view, a second object appeared and did the same followed by a third & fourth.
approximately 20min later i was facing north & saw  the 4 objects in close formation zoom off at great speed (north).
content.summary: 4 silent objects go slowly to horizon

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i went outside to have a smoke, as i walked outside, my eyes were immediatly drawn to the nw sky at this bright yellowish/orange light high in the sky over the trees.
with 2 small airports in the vicinity, we almost thought it was a small plane or possibly a helicopter, however, i have lived by airports all my life, and small planes and helicopters have multiple colored lights, and you can hear them, very clearly from where we were. the "craft" made no noise at all.  
over the next few minutes, we watched this light come down to just over the tree line, heading east over the ohio river. 
after drifting very slowly along the tree line for a few minutes, the light, which never blinked, flickered, or changed at all, started rising up and heading in a northernly direction, and in a blink of an eye it was gone.
content.summary: Bright orange/yellow light

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were on an oil lease road in the country within 3 miles of town of barnsdall on the road from barnsdall to bartlesville.  we were parked and witnessed a light make a sharp z pattern in the sky and it was proceeding towards us directly.  we were both extremely frightened.  i started the car and drove towards town and put the light behind us.  we went as fast as we could until we got to town and we were very relieved that we were not captured, which was the impression that i had.  it was trying to get us.  sometimes i wonder what would have happened if i would have stopped.  it made a very strong impression on me.
content.summary: Light makes a z pattern and approaches my car

content.detailedDescription:
Observation position 55 22 25 n - 10 25 57 e compass direction west.

i was on my way home on bicycle after visiting my mum then i saw this beautyful sunset. i found a good position and began taking pictures. i wasent satisfied with what i could see on my camera display and made some adjustments in between the shots. i took about 14-15 pictures in total of this sunset.

i didnt see the object or phenomenon while i took the pictures! i was actually wondering about some weird looking clouds but concentrated me primarily on the fast changing sunset scenery. i thought i was lucky to have this beautyful sunset on photography.

unfortunately, then i came home, i deleted nearly all of them except of four pictures, which i liked best. they were taken right after each other in a 14 seconds timeframe, with the mode dial function set to "sun", which clearly gave the best results in this particular situation.

well, two days after i looked at these four pictures again, enjoyed them because they are beautyful, and then i saw this little sphere rest on a cloud in the horizon.

i use photoshop often and made an animation with the four photos, and i can see there, that the object appears to be steady while the clouds passing by it quite fast (see file 3).

original 10m pixel pics (3872x2592) taken with a sony a-100 reflex camera you may request for further research:

dsc03953.Jpg
dsc03954.Jpg
dsc03955.Jpg
dsc03956.Jpg

multimedia attachments
file 1: wide cut from dsc03955.Jpg
file 2: object close-ups taken from dsc03955.Jpg
file 3: gif animation of the object based on cuts from all four photos

for more info and pictures:
http://ufophenomenondenmark.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: A dark grey sphere rest on a cloud...

content.detailedDescription: Occured approx 530am, right before dawn today. i was sleeping in bed and was awakened by what sounded like a very low flying airplane, however the "whirring" sound sounded a bit strange to me. i didnt think too much of it, other than it sounding odd, until my son in the next room came running into my room scared out of his mind, he too was awakened from it. so i then got up to look out the window and seen an bright orange colored disc shaped object, unlike any aircraft ive ever seen, slowly making its way south i believe, midway above the tree lines, quite low. the sound faded as it went further away until the "orange glow" faded. ive seen some unexplained orb formations in the past but nothing like this, and witnessed the recent nasa black brandt launch that was an explainable sight. even the sound of this thing as it passed by made was almost as tacky as a low budget sound effect heard in sci fi movies as well. it was very bizzare, my youngest son was also a witness to this. very traumatizing to him, because of not having a logical explaination to what this was. very strange. im not sure what scientifically could explain it besides of being a genuine ufo? i wouldnt have believed i really seen it if it wasnt for my son being with me as well, because it was just such an unbeleivable experience. i had to question myself a few times afterwards what the heck id just seen.
content.summary: Disc shape bright orange low pitch whirring sound

content.detailedDescription:
10 oct 2009, 00:30 in the morning.
skies were clear.

last night, while we were at club 9 downtown, the whole patio saw a triangular ufo pass from west to east over south ptown (halfway between ohsu and pioneer square), then turn south over the i5/405 interchange. it was maybe 50' above the downtown buildings. it was about 75'(give or take) across and was moving rather quickly. the triangle seemed to have round corners and the three main lights underneath were grayish in color. when it turned south, it banked at a 40 degree angle. there was a slight anomoly with the air - it seemed to shimmer as though there was intense heat, a shimmer that one would see coming off of a road during the summer sun, but it was slight. the ship was extremely clear to see, although it seemed to be solid flat black (minus the lights of course). 

i made a quick animation of what we saw (attached) from my perspective.

there was no sound.
i was trying to take a photograph of three girls, but the camera wasn't working, when someone yelled 'that's a f'n ufo!'  i looked up and to my right, i immediatly saw it as it passed right in front of us.

there was no doubt that it was a huge craft gliding through the night sky.

we lost sight of the object in the distance.

note:  i had lazik eye surgery a few years ago, giving me perfect 20/20 vision.  a negative result of the surgery though makes all lights at night have a slight halo and star effect len's flare.  the three lights i saw off of the craft did not give these effects, even though all of the other lights in the city and the hills behind did.

ps - the exact time was 12:30am 10 oct 2009, i put in the time of 12am and got an error msg, so i'm redoing this with the time of 1am instead
content.summary: Triangle ufo, three gray lights underneath moving west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home,with sombody else, when i saw a red, flasing dot up in the sky,i told him,i went to tell my reletive.She was on the phone,so i went back to him.                                                                                           1.In the car,talking                    
                                                                
                     2.Looking at the stars                      
                                                            
                     3.I had to tell somone                         
                                                         
                     4.A red dot,flashing,                         
                                                                   
                      motionless                                  
                                          
                      5.I was alarmed                      
                                                
                      6.I didnt
content.summary: Flashing,red,high

content.detailedDescription: I and my wife "sheila" were driving home from albion at about 2.00 am to 3.00 am. it was a vry dark night, and there was no other traffic oh the intire trip home. we were in an area where the farm land was very spread out, with large fields and no houses. a pair of very, very bright lights that were deffenetly connedted, were comming in our direction, but high in the sky. all of a sudden they decended all the way down to about fifty feet off the ground. at this point they sere still 6 or 700 yards away off to our left. they leveled off at about ten to twenty feet off the ground and came directly at us. they came very fast at us untill they were fifty yards away and then slowed down but still moving directly at us. when i thought maybe it was going to hit us, they went up over us. they didn't keep going because we could see the area around the car and the road ahead and behind was still bright with light from them. at this point we couldn't see the light because they were diredtly above us, and neither of wanted to open a window to look out and up. i don't remember leaving the area, my next memory was many miles dwon the road. at this time i remember telling my wife that it must have been a cropduster. seh replyed "at night". that responce hit me like bolt, she was right, there was no way a cropduster could see power lines, trees. and other obstacles. i can't say there was a lost amount of time or any thing like that, because we never thought about time or anything else, except what we had seen. we just  went home and to bed still discussing what happened, but not thinking to check time or anything like that. my wifes memory is excatly the same as mine, as we still discuss it once in a while. even though it happened about thirty years ago. we never wanted ti admit to ourselves that it might have been a ufo, untill the last ten or fifteen years. now we both know what it was, and neither of us can be told differently.
content.summary: Two connected very bright lights buzzed our car

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my friend to work about 5 in the morn heading west and we were just coming out of the toll booth on highway 264(at that time it was rt.44)coming up to mt. trashmore park on our left. my friend commented that the stars seemed to be blocked out over the park. i slowed down and looked,saw something really big moving across the sky.It was black but like a flat black,there was no light reflecting off of it.It moved very slow and as it got closer you could see a small row of vee shaped lights towards the front of it.They were small compared to the size of this thing. i pulled over and listen to see if we could hear anything because i thought at first that it was a blimp.  it was making no sound at all,just drifting slowly across the highway.I know it wasn't more than 100 to 200 yards above the tree tops. we took the exit off the highway at newtown road and watched it head towards (i'm assuming ) to the northeast and we lost sight of it.
we never told anyone around us about it because we thought they wouldn't believe us.We weren't scared at the time,just excited and really freaked..
content.summary: Moved over our car silently and slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home one earl fall late afternoon/early evening. i had just dropped my niece at her home which was about 10 miles north of where i lived at the time. as i was driving and playing around with my radio looking for a good station i noticed my car had stalled. this kinds confused me as just a second before i was listening to music, then nothing. i instantly tried to start my car and nothing happened.  i then looked around and noticed there were no lights anywhere even though it had recently gotten dark. there were no other vehicles or people anywhere either. that was strange because it was a weekday on a fairly busy major route through my town. it was also evening rush hour. i then tried to look around to see what i might do to help myself. i became aware of a kinda low hum? coming from my right passenger side of the car. the windows were electric so i couldn't raise it down to ascertain where the sound was being produced. finally, i opened the driver car door next to me and kinda stood up against the car with the door leaning against me. as i looked up and across the road i saw what appeared to be a huge silent plane of some sort. it did not make any sound except for the low, low hum? i had originally heard?/felt. it was huge and i tried to come up for a way to gauge it's size in relevance to surrounding architecture. the only thing i could think of was it was at least 3 times longer than the football field at the high school right up the road from where i was standing. it looked like it was sitting right on top of the tree line/power lines that lined that side of the road. it was so big sideways and in height i knew i couldn't take the size all in my line of vision. it appeared to have
starting around the middle of it a row of very tall windows illuminating a strong bright blue light. i was aware of several figures moving about and maybe even watching me watch them. i was not afraid or uncomfortable in any way. i don't know why in the world i would have stood outside my car to investigate this thing. in reality i would have never done something like that on my own. i am an avowed coward to say the lease and this was very out of character for me. as i watched it finally moved straight up higher above the trees silently. it then jetted n west towards newark rd/newark ohio. it accelerated so fast! just up and gone. it didn't turn itself around or maneuver at all, just slightly up and sideways gone like that! the next thing i know i am driving my car coming up to a gas station
right up the road from where the craft had been. all the lights were on and traffic was very light. i had no idea of what time it was or how much had passed since my clock in the car had been disrupted. when i finally got home i saw my trip had taken me well over 3 hours to complete! i didn't know how to explain the missing time even to the sitter who was there for my young children. she was a friend of the family who actually lived with us at the time so that worked out just fine. i almost forgot the incident completely by then. i tried to remember every detail but just kept drifting way in thought or something. when my husband came home from work at 11 or so that night we didn't discuss it at all. i failed to say anything to him about it for about the next three months or so. i don't know why. i just kinda forgot.
content.summary: Hovering over tree line on business/residential street

content.detailedDescription:
Http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=ndz483ztdue
nasa lcross anomalies


nasa video shows hd thermal pockets on the moon where the lcross rocket was supposed to hit. however, nasa says the selected area was chosen due to the extreme cold temperatures where the sun would not have melted any ice.
2 problems:

1. the thermal camera shows clear pockets of circular hot spots that are in unlighted areas on the moon. this is impossible unless the cameras were adjusted to read a minute amount of heat. if the cameras were adjusted to pick up the smallest amounts of heat, the explosion would have been a very bright white spot on impact. there was not even the slightest hint of heat at the impact point even though nasa commentators said there were definite signatures from the explosion.

2. from the 1969 apollo tapes you can see there is at least an inch of dust that covers the moon. the second stage of the lcross rocket (which was recording the event) had 4 minutes to see at least the movement of that dust if the rocket had failed to detonate. if not the tnt included on the lc1 rocket would of accelerated anything into the view of the cameras. even dust flying around (especially from an explosion), the particles put off small amount of heat when colliding with each other, when nasa switches to the thermal cameras they recorded nothing.

**other anomalies in the posted nasa video:
the second stage of the rocket ends transmission clearly before impact, when nasa switches to the control room you can see a pc in the foreground still recording live images that we did not get to see.

shortly after the mission is over, some congrads were in order except for the gentleman in the middle desk. he abruptly stands up, packs his laptop, and walks over to unplug his power pack. another employee attempts to high five him; he sternly makes a remark and then exits quite quickly. hmmmm.

let the games begin. thank you for your time.

travis
dod employee
content.summary: Nasa lcross problems

content.detailedDescription: Let me describe my rather short encounter with something i couldn't explain. i work 3rd shift doing security at an apartment complex in downtown providence. it was 5am, at which time i leave the office to check all the parking lots and unlock the lobby doors. i was walking from one building to the next when i noticed a light moving quite slow in the sky. i thought it was moving much to slow to be an airplane, also it was completely silent. it was similar to the way a hot air balloon would glow at night, but i do not believe this was a balloon. i took out my cell phone, as quick as i could, and took a couple pictures of this phenomena. it was moving from the north to the south in a straight line. it was completely overcast and it seemed as if the light was inside the cloud cover, as i could see no structure, just an orb of light. from the first picture to the last is a time span of about 1 minute.
content.summary: Yellowish-gold glowing orb over downtown prividence

content.detailedDescription:
It was about three in the afternoon, and i was walking down the sidewalk. it was a fairly cloudy day, and i was on my way home. i looked up at the sky and noticed something really out-of-the ordinary: a pink object in the sky. it's shape was that of a barrel, but stretched out. its colour was pink, and it had bright green/red lights on the bottom of it, with was probably the most prominent feature of it. it spun, and had kind of a metal/grey disk on its top.

i had left my phone in the house, and i figured that it would have been too late if i ran to get it. so i watched the ufo as it hovered across the sky for a few minutes, and then jolted up through the clouds, leaving a small puncture in them. i was horrified by this thing, my face turned pale. i didn't know what to tell people, they would think i'm making it up. but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Pink, elongated barrel-shape ufo spotted above my home.
